Dear Hariy:
Put this in your briefcase and next
time you take a trip maybe you* 11 find a moment
to read it* I*m not much on "writin”, but I
took advantage of an invite from BHDADCASTING, to
put on paper some thoughts about labor and radio
for their recent special issue.
